Jotunn was not happy. The Silver Wings had taken up the defence of the
planet, and at the same time, had shown they were capable of producing
a warship. He was not going to let Razorwing outmaneuver him like this
very long.

Jotunn: This is Lord Jotunn. Be sure, Lord Razorwing, that I will be
present, he said in a low voice, yet you will not like to have me at
your table.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> Lord Razorwing had sent troops to rescue the surviving crewmembers and
> salvage the Blackfeather. By now, anyone with minimum electronic
> senses would have realized that the Silver Wings had managed to build
> a warship. It was time to vent his fury.
> 
> He called for a live connection  with the other Lords and Lady. He set
> it as a high priority message that would intenionally disturb what
> they were doing.
> 
> Razorwing: Lords and Lady, dear colleagues, you might not have
> realized it, but we have just been caught unaware. Two minions alone
> have destroyed an orbital production plant and crippled my Silver Wing
> warship. There have been dozens of casualties, most of them workers
> from the station. This is the act we were dreading in silence. War has
> been declared! We have to act now! I thus convene an exceptional
> Governmental Session between the five of us to decide on the course of
> actions. I will welcome you here in Relay in just a few cycles. Be
> sure to be there!
> 
> OOC: All Lords and Lady must leave their current tasks on Friday the
> 12 of august. the Session will begin Saturday during the day.
